alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:59PM EDT until July 13 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LAMOILLE...ORLEANS AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 659 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jay In Franklin County, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Morrisville, Orleans, Derby Center, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Eden, Orleans Village, Brownington, Albany, Hyde Park, Wolcott, Coventry, Troy, Brownington Village, Irasburg, Derby Line Village, Westfield, and Morrisville Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
